TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 提供有关工作流事件的数据。

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 与工作流实例关联的工作流事件。Workflow events are associated with a workflow instance. 一个 ，包含与工作流事件关联的 。A contains the associated with the workflow event. 从 类派生的 或对象可提供 类中所有工作流事件的有关数据。A or an object that derives from the class provides the data for all of the workflow events in the class. 是 、 和 的基类。 is the base class for , , and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在调用事件处理程序方法时使用 属性来获取 对象。The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a object using the property when an event handler method is called. 当 事件发生时，调用本示例中定义的 `OnWorkflowIdled` 方法。When the event occurs, the `OnWorkflowIdled` method defined in this example is called. 该方法使用 属性来确定哪个工作流处于空闲状态，然后通过调用 方法来获取该工作流实例的排队项的集合。It determines which workflow is idled using the property and then gets a collection of queued items for the workflow instance by calling the method. 该代码会循环访问该集合以确定哪个活动正在等待使工作流处于空闲状态的事件。The code iterates over the collection to determine which activity is waiting for the event that idled the workflow. 然后，该代码将使用 方法以及事件队列项的名称向工作流队列发出一个异常。It then sends an exception to the workflow queue using the method along with the name of the event queue item. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“取消工作流”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Canceling a Workflow SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[取消工作流](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb)。For more information, see [Canceling a Workflow](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#261](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#261)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#261](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#261)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WorkflowInstance As WorkflowInstance

summary.span: 获取与工作流事件关联的工作流实例。

span.span: Gets the workflow instance associated with the workflow event.
The associated with the workflow event.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在调用事件处理程序方法时使用 属性来获取 对象。The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a object using the property when an event handler method is called. 当 事件发生时，调用本示例中定义的 `OnWorkflowIdled` 方法。When the event occurs, the `OnWorkflowIdled` method defined in this example is called. 该方法使用 属性来确定哪个工作流处于空闲状态，然后通过调用 方法来获取该工作流实例的排队项的集合。It determines which workflow is idled using the property and then gets a collection of queued items for the workflow instance by calling the method. 该代码会循环访问该集合以确定哪个活动正在等待使工作流处于空闲状态的事件。The code iterates over the collection to determine which activity is waiting for the event that idled the workflow. 然后，该代码将使用 方法以及事件队列项的名称向工作流队列发出一个异常。It then sends an exception to the workflow queue using the method along with the name of the event queue item. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“取消工作流”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Canceling a Workflow SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[取消工作流](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb)。For more information, see [Canceling a Workflow](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5077f56-a78b-48e7-825c-f6c77c8e54fb). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#261](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#261)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#261](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#261)]
